summary: This is an email chain from October 23, 2019, between attorney Gloria Allred and an FBI contact, discussing logistics for a new alleged victim of Jeffrey Epstein to attend a victim meeting in New York and be interviewed. The correspondence reveals coordination between a victim's attorney and law enforcement shortly after Epstein's death.

persons.name: Gloria Allred
persons.context: Attorney communicating with FBI to arrange for her new client, an alleged Epstein victim, to attend a victim meeting and be interviewed. She is coordinating meeting logistics from her office or at the FBI.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referred to as the perpetrator whose alleged victim is the subject of the email discussion. The new client is described as 'a victim of Epstein'.

connections.description: Allred is representing a client who is an alleged victim of Epstein, placing her in an attorney-client relationship with someone making accusations against Epstein.

events.title: FBI Victim Services Meeting in New York
events.description: A meeting organized by the FBI's Victim Services for alleged victims of Jeffrey Epstein. Attorneys and victims were scheduled to attend, with phones being collected during the meeting.

events.title: Interview of New Alleged Victim
events.description: Planned interview between FBI agents and a new alleged victim of Epstein, represented by Gloria Allred. Logistics were being coordinated to occur either at the FBI office or at Allred's office after the victim meeting.

events.title: Corresponding Meeting in Florida
events.description: Reference to a similar victim meeting that had occurred in Florida the previous week, indicating coordinated multi-jurisdiction victim outreach by authorities.

locations: Los Angeles, CA 90048 (Allred, Maroko & Goldberg office at 6300 Wilshire Blvd., Suite 1500)
FBI office (location unspecified, but in New York)
Washington D.C. (destination for Allred's train travel)
keyFacts: Attorney Gloria Allred had a new client in October 2019 who claimed to be a victim of Jeffrey Epstein and was willing to fly to New York for an FBI victim meeting.
The FBI was conducting Victim Services meetings for Epstein victims in multiple locations, including New York on October 23, 2019, and had held a similar meeting in Florida the previous week.
Security protocols at the FBI victim meeting included collecting attendees' phones during the session.
The email chain shows active coordination between a victim's attorney and law enforcement for victim interviews shortly after Epstein's death in August 2019.
Allred's communication indicates urgency and tight scheduling, needing to conclude an interview by 12:30 PM to catch a 2:00 PM train to Washington D.C.
